name: Connection Lost (m.vasko2)
description:
The most dangerous WiFi signal-catching you've ever done!

All you want to do is to watch your favorite movie tonight. Since you don't have internet at home, you need to download it on your phone first. Luckily, that van looks like it has a signal!

Oh wait, where does it go? The download is not finished yet! Chase the van until your favorite movie finished downloading, or die trying.

Controls

  • Up or W - Accelerate
  • Down or S - Brake/Reverse
  • Right or D - Turn Right
  • Left or A -  Turn Left

Software used

  • Godot - game engine
  • Krita - painting
  • LMMS - music
  • Explodomatica - for explosions
  • Chiptone - some sounds

Credit where it's due

I used the following sound effects in addition to the ones I've created:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/high-traffic-road-sounds
  • https://opengameart.org/content/car-engine-loop-96khz-4s
  • https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/185479/
